resources:
CST2335_GraphicalInterfaceProgramming TicketMaster event search/Wei Li Recipe Search page/Jianchuan Li Covid-19 case data/June Li The Audio Database api/name
Hello blank fragment Input name and press \"Search\" Search Input artist name Error Can not find artist No Internet Connection Welcome to recipe search page, please input the recipe and ingredients, press the button to begin search Recipe: "Please input the recipe you want to search here " Ingredients: Please input the ingredients included in the recipe here Press to search "Only one recipe " Separate ingredients with \",\" Help OK "URL: " "Ingredients: " Search Help Country From Date(YYYY-MM-DD) End Date(YYYY-MM-DD) Date(YYYY-MM-DD) The favorite data you have saved: Type Here Add To Favorite Clear Recovery Hide The Search Result open close favorites help go back to login Recipe Search Jianchuan Li 1.0 save hide this recipe is saved to favorates Welcome to Covid-19 search page. You can input the country name and date,then press the "SEARCH" button to search the detailed data,including province, cases. If you want to save the result, press "ADD TO FAVORITE" button. If you want to delete the saved record, click the specific record. Help Welcome to ticket search page. Please input the city name and radius! Press the SEARCH button to begin search. OK Press the FAVORITE button go to the favorite events page. Press the TOOLBAR button go to Toolbar and Navigation page. Help Welcome to ticket event detail page! Press the SAVE AS FAVORITE button can save events as favorite. OK HELP Help Welcome to ticket favorite page! Long press the event can delete the chosen one. OK CityRadius Radius SEARCH FAVORITE Toolbar HELP Save as favorite HELP TicketMaster-event-search, written by Wei Li, version 1.0. Choices Search Favorite Error! Please input city and radius. Events has been loaded successfully! Sorry, No events found! OK Do you want to delete this? Yes The item has been deleted! UNDO The Item has been recovered! No Open Close
